about_the_game:
Learn Hangul with a game.

[STORY]
Oh, no! Something makes the monsters from the Red Spider Dungeon go out and touch the grass! Let’s investigate and stop those monsters!
But why are there robots?

[FEATURES]
- The Less Boring Way
If you don’t like rote memorization of Hangul letters or you remember easily what a thing does in a game, then this game is made for you!
If you just want to relax and play a shooter game, you can choose the Beginner difficulty.

- Play the Minigame Too
To reinforce what you learn, relax, or get coins faster, you can try the minigame! Minigame is supposed to be like those classic games to learn Hangul.

- Build Your Own Playstyle!
You can choose the [Pew Pew] class or other classes. Then make a good set of skills to clear a level!

- The Rush Phase!
Do you miss that gaming moment when you must avoid obstacles at a high speed? Well, that’s when the Rush Phase comes in! However, it isn’t that fast because you must also think about the Hangul letters.

- The Boss Phase
Bosses have much more HP. Therefore, it’s perfect to learn Hangul letters slowly but surely! But yeah, sometimes it isn’t that easy, so it’s time to focus!

- 1 Hour Drill!
To finish the game, approximately one hour is needed, so it’s 1 hour drill!
Currently, there are 11 levels and 15 enemy patterns. This is only considering the first location on the map.

[PACKAGES]
Packages are paid features to enhance your gaming experience. It’s PWYW (pay what you want), but in the future, there may be a paid version that includes chosen features.

- TOPIK 1 Vocab
There is a minigame to learn TOPIK I vocabulary (600+ essential words)! It’s also supposed to improve your Hangul reading fluency.

highlighted.name: The King of Game and Study

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is basically bombing the enemies, so I think it's extreme violence and may not be appropriate for all ages. But this may be only my excessive worry.
Aside from that, the game contains things/topics that are apparent in Martial Arts/Revenge manhwa, which may not be appropriate for all ages.

movies.name: 100% of My Brain in the Rush Phase

name: Hangul Shooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 640 x 360 monitor resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5625U with Radeon Graphics (2.30 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 monitor resolution

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Learn Hangul with a game. Shooting the enemies or playing a minigame with an anime character by your side. This is a fun starting point for learning Korean!
